summary:
Ravana was a powerful demon-king who ruled the island of Lanka. He is famous for his role in the Hindu story, the Ramayana. Ravana kidnapped Rama's wife, Sita, and took her to his kingdom. But Rama, with the help of his monkey friends, fought and defeated Ravana to save Sita.

Although a villain, Ravana was very smart and knew a lot about ancient texts and religion. He was a big fan of the god Shiva, and you can often see his image near Shiva in temples. His story is also told in other ancient texts like the Jain Ramayana.
title: Ravana
